title: Beat the devil (Special edition)
subject_group: Literature/American literature - Film and video adaptations
Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Swindlers and swindling
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion picture trailers
description: The story of a motley group of swindlers travelling on an Africa-bound tramp steamer. The plot unfolds to reveal a web of double crossing and deception as each attempts to get their hands on a fortune in uranium deposits. Starring Gina Lollobrigida and Humphrey Bogart. Written by Truman Capote and John Huston from a novel by James Helvick. This version includes an introduction by Tony Curtis and a bonus clip of the original theatrical trailer for Humphrey Bogart's 'The Big sleep'.
